comments:
i20030930 + Equinox

Got this NPE stack trace when trying to launch a runtime workbench.
It seems that the cause is that java.io.File.list()/listFiles() may return null
if an I/O error happens (instead of throwing an exception), and
LauncherUtils.deleteContent is not prepared to handle that case.

!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Launching Equinox".
!STACK 0
